text:
Amazing ...!
We can dance here today...!

Hey, is there anything you're worried about?
It's your first time working as a backup dancer...

Not at all...! I'm super nervous,
but I just want to jump onto the stage right now!
Yeah, you seem as pumped as always.

Of course! Because I can work like this,
it's all thanks to you, Producer!

With the schedule adjustments you've made,
I need to repay the favor properly...!

Haha, that's fine.
Besides... you've already done plenty to repay it.

Huh!? Th-that's not true...
I just wanted to be friends with them...!

Of course, their efforts matter too. But even so,
it's thanks to Meguru being considerate of her friends.

Producer...!
Hehe, I feel all warm inside...!

Thanks to you, I feel like I can work even harder from
now on...! Because... there's nothing better than this!
